SEARCH
Package Model

Class Level

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.Level
public class Level extends Observable
This class manages the level and all its components, i.e. enemies, obstacles and powerups. Each level is built from a matrix of integers
See Also:

  • Obstacle
